title: Himi 234
lyrics:
M.NG
1.
Hiva ki he ‘Eiki Lahi,
Ko Sihova ia;
Hiva, pea fakafeta’i,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.
2.
Ke tau fakaongo lelei,
‘A hotau ‘Otua;
‘I he’ene angalelei,
Kia kitautolu.
3.
Pea kuo ne toloi,
Hotau ngaahi ‘aho;
Pea kuo tau lava’i,
‘A e ta’u fo’ou.
4.
Pea kuo tau kātoa,
Ki hotu ‘Otua,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko homau hūfanga.
5.
’Oku ngali ke mau hoko.
‘Eiki ‘i ho ‘ao,
‘I he ngaahi hiva fo’ou,
Mo e fuakava.
6.
Ke ke ma’u ‘akimautolu,
‘I he ta’u fo’ou ni,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko homau Huhu’i.
7.
Ke mau tupu ‘i he tui,
Pea mo e ‘ofa,
Pea mau mā’oni’oni,
‘I he ‘Afiona. *
